datafield.subfield: Association of Geoscientists for International Development.
Report (Association of Geoscientists for International Development)
Report series (Association of Geoscientists for International Development)
Special report (Association of Geoscientists for International Development)
Association of Geoscientists for International Development
Available from A. Gibbs, Dept. of Geological Sciences, Cornell University

Title fluctuates from volume to volume, e.g.: v. 7-8 have both titles: Geosciences in international development, AGID report; v. 9, 13, 16 have title: AGID report; v. 10 has both titles: Geosciences in international development, Report; v. 11, 12 have title: Report series; v. 14 has both titles: Geosciences in international development, AGID report series; etc. AGID report and its various permutations det. to be subtitle or variant of series
Symp. on Min. Explor. Tech. in Trop. Forest Areas (1977 : Caracas, Ven.). Hidden wealth, 1982:
t.p. (The Geosciences in international development, AGID report series ; no. 14, issued by A.A. Balkema, Rotterdam)

ser. t.p. (AGID special publication series, the Geosciences in international development) t.p. (17th special report; issued by Chapman & Hall, London and New York) t.p. verso (AGID special publication no. 17) fwd. (latest Special Publication in the AGID Geosciences in International Development series)

(hdg.: Geosciences in international development; usages: Geosciences in international development. AGID report; Geosciences in international development. Report; AGID report; series name does not appear on nos. 1-2)
